source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a point-of-view shot from within the steel superstructure of a large bridge, looking down its length. Graffiti is visible on an overhead beam, and below, train tracks run down the center, flanked by roadways and pink railings. A subway train is positioned on the tracks, and the bright sunlight casts long, dramatic shadows across the entire structure.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback: 1. A subway train is positioned on the tracks,朝着camera方向驶来。frame左右两侧可以看见来来往往行驶的汽车
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: 1. A subway train is positioned on the tracks, moving towards the camera. On both sides of the frame, cars can be seen traveling back and forth.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: 1. A subway train is positioned on the tracks, moving towards the camera. On both sides of the frame, cars can be seen traveling back and forth.
source_caption_data.gpt_caption: This is a point-of-view shot from within the steel superstructure of a large bridge, looking down its length. Graffiti is visible on an overhead beam, and below, train tracks run down the center, flanked by roadways and pink railings. A subway train is positioned on the tracks, moving towards the camera, while on both sides of the frame, cars can be seen traveling back and forth. The bright sunlight casts long, dramatic shadows across the entire structure.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a point-of-view shot from within the steel superstructure of a large bridge, looking down its length. Graffiti is visible on an overhead beam, and below, train tracks run down the center, flanked by roadways and pink railings. A subway train is positioned on the tracks, moving towards the camera, while on both sides of the frame, cars can be seen traveling back and forth. The bright sunlight casts long, dramatic shadows across the entire structure.

bad_caption: A cyclist pedals along a narrow wooden boardwalk suspended over a river, weaving between orange traffic cones placed at intervals. In the background, a group of joggers runs in the opposite direction, while a rowboat glides slowly beneath the bridge. As the cyclist approaches the camera, a flock of pigeons takes off from the railing, flying overhead and casting brief shadows on the path.
